# Demonhide (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Evil creature touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 63

*You touch your minion with your holy symbol and invoke the horrid words of the lower planes. A fiery glow spreads across your servantâ€™s skin, leaving it with a deep red luster.*

The subject gains damage reduction 5/cold iron or good.
